policies.title: POLICIES & TERMS
policies.termsText1: By making a purchase at LIMITÃ˜, you accept the following terms and conditions of sale in accordance with Colombian legislation.
policies.termsText2: Legal Name: LIMITÃ˜ is a registered trademark operating under Colombian e-commerce laws.
policies.termsText3: Products: All products are limited and numbered editions. Images are for reference only and may vary slightly from the final product. Availability is not guaranteed once the drop sells out.
policies.retractionText1: In accordance with the Colombian Consumer Statute, you have the right to withdraw from your purchase within 5 business days following receipt of the product, without justification.
policies.retractionItem1: The product must be unused, with original tags and in its original packaging
policies.retractionItem2: You must notify us by email at limitohats@gmail.com
policies.retractionItem3: Return shipping costs are borne by the buyer
policies.retractionItem4: Refund will be processed within 30 business days of receiving the returned product
policies.retractionNote: Note on limited editions: Due to the exclusive and numbered nature of our drops, we do not guarantee availability of the same product for replacement. If a withdrawal is approved, the customer will receive a full monetary refund for the amount paid.
policies.shippingNationalTime1: BogotÃ¡ and main cities: 3-5 business days
policies.shippingNationalTime2: Rest of the country: 5-8 business days
policies.shippingNationalCost: Cost: Free shipping on all Drop 001 orders
policies.shippingNationalTracking: You will receive a tracking number once your order is dispatched
policies.shippingIntlCoverage: Coverage: United States, Mexico and main Latin American countries
policies.shippingIntlTime1: United States and Mexico: 5-8 business days
policies.shippingIntlTime2: Rest of Latin America: 8-15 business days
policies.shippingIntlCost: Cost: Calculated automatically at checkout based on destination country
policies.shippingIntlNote1: Import taxes and customs duties of the destination country are the buyer's responsibility. LIMITÃ˜ is not responsible for delays caused by customs processes.
policies.shippingIntlNote2: International orders are not eligible for returns or exchanges, except in cases of proven manufacturing defects.
policies.returnsDefective: Defective products: If you receive a product with manufacturing defects, contact us within 48 hours of receipt with a photo of the defect and your order number.
policies.returnsExchange: Color exchanges: We accept exchanges within 5 business days, provided the product is unused and with original tags. Subject to inventory availability.
policies.returnsStep1: Send an email to limitohats@gmail.com with your order number and reason
policies.returnsStep2: Wait for our confirmation and authorization
policies.returnsStep3: Send the product to the address we will provide
policies.returnsStep4: Once received and verified, we will process the exchange or refund
policies.paymentMethod1: Debit and credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex)
policies.paymentSecurity: All payments are processed securely through PayU. We do not store banking information on our servers.
policies.dataText: Your data will be treated confidentially and used solely to process orders, send purchase communications, and promotional information only if authorized by you.
